alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Morgan; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, northwestern Putnam and Jasper Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Rutledge to near Monticello, and moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Madison, Monticello, Rutledge, Newborn, Shady Dale, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Calvin, Farrar, and Godfrey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
